description: Provides nodes in order to interact with 7 segment displays
name: 7-segment

ry3JlilSN.content:
The pins are as follows:

+-E-+
F   D    
+-G-+
A   C
+-B-+ DOT 

Double click to comment to view it properly

@/7-segment.description: Controls a 7 segment LED display. Double click the patch and read the comment to view the pin layout.

B1zyfQgSV.description: Value (digit and optional dot to turn on decimal separator). Examples are "2" and "4."
B1zyfQgSV.label: VAL

S1mez7gBV.description: True if the 7-segment display is Common Cathode (the middle pins are connected to ground)
S1mez7gBV.label: CC

@/7-segment-controller.description: Controls a 7 segment display. Accepts the pins and the values for segments A to G and for the DOT and writes the values when UPD is emited.

rkVY0feB4.description: Emits if any of the digital writes emits an error
rkVY0feB4.label: ERR

Sks9pclBV.content:
The pins are as follows:

+-E-+
F   D    
+-G-+
A   C
+-B-+ DOT 

Double click to comment to view it properly

@/7-segment-convertor.description: Converts a digit with or without decimal after (e.g. "2", "4.") to the outputs needed for a 7 segment display. Double click the patch and read the comment for pin layout.

SksBHOkrN.description: Value (digit and optional dot to turn on decimal separator). Examples are "2" and "4."
SksBHOkrN.label: VAL

rkdsIOkrE.description: True if the 7-segment display is Common Cathode (the middle pins are connected to ground)
rkdsIOkrE.label: CC

ryos5ukB4.description: Pulsed if the input value is invalid.
ryos5ukB4.label: ERR

HklnBrWxHV.description: Value (digit and optional dot to turn on decimal separator). Examples are "2" and "4."
HklnBrWxHV.label: VAL

HyZ2BBZeSV.description: True if the 7-segment display is Common Cathode (the middle pins are connected to ground)
HyZ2BBZeSV.label: CC

r1ga8rWxHN.description: Pulsed if the input value is invalid.
r1ga8rWxHN.label: ERR

@/all.description: Pulses on output when all inputs receive a pulse

HJY1QjgrE.content:
Debug then change the value, the 7 segment display should update every second
--->

ByJQQjlrE.content: Timer that starts at boot and restarts itself, set to 1 second

SknLXilS4.content: Set to True if the middle pin connects to ground (common cathode)

SyyjQjeHE.content:
As of now, the controller node (used by the main node) requires the DOT port to be mapped and used too.

You can use the convertor node and map the values received manually to the outputs in order to not use the DOT port.

@/7-segment-single-digit-example.description: An example of how to use the library, which takes a number and displays it on the 7 segment display
